snippet: The long-lived Southern rock group has announced 10 shows at the Beacon in March, during a year in which it will celebrate the 40th - yes, 40th! - anniversary of its live album "Eat a Peach."
abstract: The long-lived Southern rock group has announced 10 shows at the Beacon in March, during a year in which it will celebrate the 40th - yes, 40th! - anniversary of its live album "Eat a Peach."

headline.main: Allman Brothers Band Announces a March Return to Beacon Theater
headline.print_headline: Allman Brothers Band Announces Beacon Dates
